mods.abstract: WLW (Cincinnati, OH) radio program The Almanac, evidently originally broadcast February 17, 1944 (part 2). Featuring Captain Stubby (Tom C. Fouts) and the Buccaneers, including Curley Myers and Dwight E. "Tiny" Stokes, with an unidentified announcer.

subject.topic: Captain Stubby and the Buccaneers (Musical group)

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
